name: Next Elevator
tag_list: human-resources, talents, career, resume, resume-builder, job-search, recruiting, recruitment, job-application, resume-tips, hiring, jobs, candidate-database
overview:
NextElevator is an online platform that connects talents to their dream companies. Hiring managers from thousands of top companies worldwide access and search their candidate database for talents.

  1. EVERYONE can benefit

  2. NextElevator targets all age groups and industries.

  3. LIFE LONG career benefits

  4. NextElevator invites users to create and update personal profiles. A one-time effort will result in life long career benefits.

  5. Highly professional RESUME BUILDER

  6. Using their expert tool, users can download highly professional resumes whenever they need it, for job search purposes within (or outside) their site, for free.

  7. TALENTS at hiring managers’ fingertip

  8. NextElevator encourages hiring managers and HR staffs of prestigious companies to sign up for free recruiter accounts. They can then search through the database for talented individuals and instantly send request for interviews, for free.

  9. 100% free

  10. No hidden charges; job seekers nor recruiters.
